到達目標: 英文シラバスをご参照ください。
授業の概要・背景: After a general introduction to the SDGs, we will look at goals 2, 4, 5, 8, and 13 in more detail. After this initial introduction, each week we will look at case studies as well as academic papers. As the SDGs are interconnected, we will often be looking at activities aimed at more than one goal at a time. We will take examples from all over the world and from actors at various level from international, national and municipal governments, non-profit organizations and non-government organizations.
授業方法: This course will require active participation. The course instructor will introduce ideas, examples and key concepts, but students will be asked to prepare a task or read a chapter before the class and do group work in class to take the content further.
